name: Space Typer (Reantsiko)
description:
Space Typer is a 2D Arcade Space Shooter, based on bullet hell games.

Take aim at enemies by typing the words underneath them!
But be careful, as any mistake you make can cause retaliation!

Music by Arkaene, check them out here!
Current used art by Brett Gregory, check out his work here!

Note:
This game is still in early development so you could encounter bugs!
Planned future updates:

  • Player movement
  • Random events
  • Boss fights
